briefTitle: Comparison of Nipple-areolar Complex Sensation According to Incision Types in Nipple-sparing Mastectomy
officialTitle: Comparison of Nipple-areolar Complex Sensation According to Incision Types in Nipple-sparing Mastectomy
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Loss of NAC sensory by pinprick test
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

1. Females who are older than 18
2. Patients who underwent nipple sparing mastectomy in Gangnam Severance Hospital

Exclusion Criteria:

1. Loss or excision of NAC due to post-surgical necrosis
2. Diagnosis of other conditions that may interfere with cutaneous sensation
